title: Myths of Orion: Light from the North HD (2014) PC [FINAL]
description:
============================================
Myths of Orion: Light from the North HD (2014) PC [FINAL]
============================================

- ENG

============================================
Description:                               =
============================================

A long time ago, in a Realm of Orion, a powerful, but greedy wizard collected knowledge from all around the world. And thus came to write the three Books: books of Knowledge, Law and Magic.
The books gave him ultimate powers. But he used them not to prosper, but for chaos!
One day the mighty enchantress Salina gathered all of her strength and courage and stole the Books from the Wizard.
Under the cover of a night, she took the Books and her child, baby Meredith, and ran far, far away to the North, to her sister ArielÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s house - at the very edge of the world. She could only hope the Wizard wouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t find them there. And so, the years and decades passed by... until one day...

============================================
Features:                                  =
============================================

 Help Meredith stop the Wizard and his wrath
- Explore the 3 unique Kingdoms of Orion
- Solve hundreds of quests and dozens of Minigames
- Win achievements and find special items
- In-detail customization of your gameplay experience
- High definition graphics and full motion cinematics
